resources.string: Personality App
Begin
Male
What is your sex?
Female
Part 1
Please answer honestly to each question with how you feel or would act in each situation. Ready?
Choose the word that appeals to you more based on it\'s meaning (not how it looks or sounds). Ready?
Part 2
When you go somewhere for the day, would you rather
plan what you will do and when, or
just go!!
As a teacher, which would you rather teach?
Fact-based courses such as math
Courses involving opinion or theory
Are you usually
A good mixer with groups of people
Rather quiet and reserved
Do you more often let
Your heart rule your head, or
Your head rule your heart
In doing something that many other people do, would you rather
Invent a way of your own, or
Do it in the accepted way
Among your friends are you
Full of news about everybody, or
One of the last to hear what is going on
Does the idea of making a list of what you should get done over a weekend
Help you out
Stress you out
Positively depress you
When you have a special job to do, do you like to
Organize it carefully before you start
Learn the requirements as you work through it
Do you tend to have
Broad friendships with many different people
Deep friendships with very few people
Who do you admire more?
Someone normal who tries to avoid the center of attention
Someone original who doesn\'t care if they are (or aren\'t) the center of attention
Which do you prefer?
Making group plans well in advance
Being free to do whatever looks fun when the time comes
Who do you usually get along better with?
Realistic people
Imaginative people
When you are with the group of people, would you usually rather
Join in talking with the group
Be more reserved, chiming in occasionally
